   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% This test suite is basically a "placeholder" for a proper test suite...
   23: %% Also we should really call prim_net directly, and not net (since that does
   24: %% not even reside here).
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: %% Run the entire test suite: 
   28: %% ts:run(emulator, net_SUITE, [batch]).
   29: %%
   30: %% Run a specific group:
   31: %% ts:run(emulator, net_SUITE, {group, foo}, [batch]).
   32: %%
   33: %% Run a specific test case:
   34: %% ts:run(emulator, net_SUITE, foo, [batch]).
   35: 
   36: -module(net_SUITE).
   37: 
   38: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   39: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   40: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   41: 
   42: %% Suite exports
   43: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   44: -export([init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   45:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
   46:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   47: 
   48: %% Test cases
   49: -export([
   50:          %% *** API Basic ***
   51:          api_b_gethostname/1,
   52:          api_b_getifaddrs/1,
   53:          api_b_name_and_addr_info/1,
   54:          
   55:          api_b_name_and_index/1,
   56: 
   57:          %% *** API Misc ***
   58:          api_m_getaddrinfo_v4/0,
   59:          api_m_getaddrinfo_v4/1,
   60:          api_m_getaddrinfo_v6/0,
   61:          api_m_getaddrinfo_v6/1,
   62: 
   63:          api_m_getnameinfo_v4/0,
   64:          api_m_getnameinfo_v4/1,
   65:          api_m_getnameinfo_v6/0,
   66:          api_m_getnameinfo_v6/1
   67: 
   68:          %% Tickets
   69:         ]).
   70: 
   71: 
   72: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   73: 
   74: -define(FAIL(R), exit(R)).
   75: -define(SKIP(R), throw({skip, R})).
   76: 
   77: 
   78: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   79: 
   80: suite() ->
   81:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   82:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   83: 
   84: all() -> 
   85:     Groups = [{api, "ENET_TEST_API", include}],
   86:     [use_group(Group, Env, Default) || {Group, Env, Default} <- Groups].
   87: 
   88: use_group(Group, Env, Default) ->
   89: 	case os:getenv(Env) of
   90: 	    false when (Default =:= include) ->
   91: 		[{group, Group}];
   92: 	    false ->
   93: 		[];
   94: 	    Val ->
   95: 		case list_to_atom(string:to_lower(Val)) of
   96: 		    Use when (Use =:= include) orelse 
   97: 			     (Use =:= enable) orelse 
   98: 			     (Use =:= true) ->
   99: 			[{group, Group}];
  100: 		    _ ->
  101: 			[]
  102: 		end
  103: 	end.
  104:     
  105: 
  106: groups() -> 
  107:     [{api,       [], api_cases()},
  108:      {api_basic, [], api_basic_cases()},
  109:      {api_misc,  [], api_misc_cases()}
  110: 
  111:      %% {tickets, [], ticket_cases()}
  112:     ].
  113:      
  114: api_cases() ->
  115:     [
  116:      {group, api_basic},
  117:      {group, api_misc}
  118:     ].
  119: 
  120: api_basic_cases() ->
  121:     [
  122:      api_b_gethostname,
  123:      api_b_getifaddrs,
  124:      api_b_name_and_addr_info,
  125:      api_b_name_and_index
  126:     ].
  127: 
  128: api_misc_cases() ->
  129:     [
  130:      api_m_getaddrinfo_v4,
  131:      api_m_getaddrinfo_v6,
  132:      api_m_getnameinfo_v4,
  133:      api_m_getnameinfo_v6
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: %% ticket_cases() ->
  137: %%     [].
  138: 
  139: 
  140: 
  141: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  142: 
  143: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  144: 
  145:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  146:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  147:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  148: 
  149:     try net:info() of
  150:         #{} ->
  151: 
  152:             case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  153:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  154:                     SKIP;
  155: 
  156:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  157: 
  158:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  159:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  160: 
  161:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  162:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  163: 
  164:                     Config1
  165:             end
  166: 
  167:     catch
  168:         error : notsup ->
  169:             {skip, "net not supported"}
  170:     end.
  171: 
  172: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  173: 
  174:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  175:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  176:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  177: 
  178:     %% Stop the local monitor
  179:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  180: 
  181:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  182: 
  183:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  184:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  185: 
  186:     Config1.
  187: 
  188: init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  189:     Config.
  190: 
  191: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  192:     Config.
  193: 
  194: 
  195: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
  196:     Config.
  197: 
  198: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
  199:     Config.
  200: 
  201: 
  202: 
  203: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  204: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  205: %%                                                                     %%
  206: %%                           API BASIC                                 %%
  207: %%                                                                     %%
  208: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  209: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  210: 
  211: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  212: 
  213: %% Get the hostname of the host.
  214: api_b_gethostname(suite) ->
  215:     [];
  216: api_b_gethostname(doc) ->
  217:     [];
  218: api_b_gethostname(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  219:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  220:     tc_try(api_b_gethostname,
  221:            fun() ->
  222:                    ok = api_b_gethostname()
  223:            end).
  224: 
  225: 
  226: api_b_gethostname() ->
  227:     case net:gethostname() of
  228:         {ok, Hostname} ->
  229:             i("hostname: ~s", [Hostname]),
  230:             ok;
  231:         {error, enotsup = Reason} ->
  232:             i("gethostname not supported - skipping"),
  233:             skip(Reason);
  234:         {error, Reason} ->
  235:             ?FAIL(Reason)
  236:     end.
  237: 
  238: 
  239: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  240: 
  241: %% This is a *very* basic test. It simply calls the function and expect
  242: %% it to succeed...
  243: api_b_getifaddrs(suite) ->
  244:     [];
  245: api_b_getifaddrs(doc) ->
  246:     [];
  247: api_b_getifaddrs(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  248:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  249:     tc_try(api_b_getifaddrs,
  250:            fun() ->
  251:                    ok = api_b_getifaddrs()
  252:            end).
  253: 
  254: 
  255: api_b_getifaddrs() ->
  256:     try net:getifaddrs() of
  257:         {ok, IfAddrs} ->
  258:             i("IfAddrs: "
  259:               "~n   ~p", [IfAddrs]),
  260:             ok;
  261:         {error, enotsup = Reason} ->
  262:             i("getifaddrs not supported - skipping"),
  263:             skip(Reason);
  264:         {error, Reason} ->
  265:             ?FAIL(Reason)
  266:     catch
  267:         error : notsup = CReason ->
  268:             Fun     = fun(F) when is_function(F, 0) ->
  269:                               try F()
  270:                               catch C:E:S -> {catched, {C, E, S}}
  271:                               end
  272:                       end,
  273:             Res2Str = fun({ok, Res})         -> ?F("ok: ~p", [Res]);
  274:                          ({error, Reason})   -> ?F("error: ~p", [Reason]);
  275:                          ({catched, {C, E}}) -> ?F("catched: ~w, ~p", [C, E])
  276:                       end,
  277:             IIRes    = Fun(fun() -> prim_net:get_interface_info(#{}) end),
  278:             ATRes    = Fun(fun() -> prim_net:get_ip_address_table(#{}) end),
  279:             AARes    = Fun(fun() -> prim_net:get_adapters_addresses(#{}) end),
  280:             IIResStr = Res2Str(IIRes),
  281:             ATResStr = Res2Str(ATRes),
  282:             IFERes   = win_getifaddrs_ife(IIRes, ATRes),
  283:             AAResStr = Res2Str(AARes),
  284:             %% Note that the prim_net module is *not* intended to 
  285:             %% be called directly. This is just a temporary thing.
  286:             i("~w => skipping"
  287:               "~n   Interface Info: "
  288:               "~n      ~s"
  289:               "~n   IP Address Table: "
  290:               "~n      ~s"
  291:               "~n   MIB If Table: "
  292:               "~n      ~p"
  293:               "~n   Adapters Addresses: "
  294:               "~n      ~p",
  295:               [CReason, IIResStr, ATResStr, IFERes, AAResStr]),
  296:             skip(CReason)
  297:     end.
  298: 
  299: win_getifaddrs_ife({ok, II}, {ok, AT}) ->
  300:     IDX1 = [IDX || #{index := IDX} <- II],
  301:     IDX2 = [IDX || #{index := IDX} <- AT],
  302:     MergedIDX = merge(IDX1, IDX2),
  303:     MibIfTable =
  304:         [try prim_net:get_if_entry(#{index => IDX}) of
  305:              {ok, Entry} ->
  306:                  Entry;
  307:              {error, _} = ERROR ->
  308:                  {IDX, ERROR}
  309:          catch
  310:              %% This is *very* unlikely since we got here because of
  311:              %% a previous 'notsup'. But just in case...
  312:              error : notsup = CReason ->
  313:                  {IDX, CReason};
  314:              C:E ->
  315:                  {IDX, {C, E}}
  316:          end || IDX <- MergedIDX],
  317:     MibIfTable;
  318: win_getifaddrs_ife(_, _) ->
  319:     undefined.
  320: 
  321:     
  322: merge([], L) ->
  323:     lists:sort(L);
  324: merge([H|T], L) ->
  325:     case lists:member(H, L) of
  326:         true ->
  327:             merge(T, L);
  328:         false ->
  329:             merge(T, [H|L])
  330:     end.
  331: 
  332:             
  333: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  334: 
  335: %% Get name and address info.
  336: api_b_name_and_addr_info(suite) ->
  337:     [];
  338: api_b_name_and_addr_info(doc) ->
  339:     [];
  340: api_b_name_and_addr_info(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  341:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  342:     tc_try(api_b_name_and_addr_info,
  343:            fun() ->
  344:                    ok = api_b_name_and_addr_info()
  345:            end).
  346: 
  347: 
  348: api_b_name_and_addr_info() ->
  349:     Domain = inet,
  350:     Addr   = which_local_addr(Domain),
  351:     SA     = #{family => Domain, addr => Addr},
  352:     try
  353:         begin
  354:             i("try getnameinfo for"
  355:               "~n   ~p", [SA]),
  356:             Hostname =
  357:                 case net:getnameinfo(SA) of
  358:                     {ok, #{host := Name, service := Service} = NameInfo} 
  359:                       when is_list(Name) andalso is_list(Service) ->
  360:                         i("getnameinfo: "
  361:                           "~n   ~p", [NameInfo]),
  362:                         Name;
  363:                     {ok, BadNameInfo} ->
  364:                         ?FAIL({getnameinfo, SA, BadNameInfo});
  365:                     {error, enotsup = ReasonNI} ->
  366:                         i("getnameinfo not supported - skipping"),
  367:                         ?SKIP({getnameinfo, ReasonNI});
  368:                     {error, Reason1} ->
  369:                         ?FAIL({getnameinfo, SA, Reason1})
  370:                 end,
  371:             i("try getaddrinfo for"
  372:               "~n   ~p", [Hostname]),
  373:             case net:getaddrinfo(Hostname) of
  374:                 {ok, AddrInfos} when is_list(AddrInfos) ->
  375:                     i("getaddrinfo: "
  376:                       "~n   ~p", [AddrInfos]),
  377:                     verify_addr_info(AddrInfos, Domain);
  378:                 {ok, BadAddrInfo} ->
  379:                     ?FAIL({getaddrinfo, Hostname, BadAddrInfo});
  380:                 {error, enotsup = ReasonAI} ->
  381:                     i("getaddrinfo not supported - skipping"),
  382:                     ?SKIP({getaddrinfo, ReasonAI});
  383:                 {error, Reason2} ->
  384:                     ?FAIL({getaddrinfo, Hostname, Reason2})
  385:             end
  386:         end
  387:     catch
  388:         error : notsup = Reason ->
  389:             i("~w => skipping", [Reason]),
  390:             skip(Reason)
  391:     end.
  392: 
  393: 
  394: verify_addr_info(AddrInfos, Domain) when (AddrInfos =/= []) ->
  395:     verify_addr_info2(AddrInfos, Domain).
  396:     
  397: verify_addr_info2([], _Domain) ->
  398:     ok;
  399: verify_addr_info2([#{addr     := #{addr   := Addr,
  400: 				   family := Domain,
  401: 				   port   := Port},
  402:                      family   := Domain,
  403:                      type     := _Type,
  404:                      protocol := _Proto}|T], Domain) 
  405:   when is_integer(Port) andalso
  406:        (((Domain =:= inet) andalso is_tuple(Addr) andalso (size(Addr) =:= 4)) orelse
  407:         ((Domain =:= inet6) andalso is_tuple(Addr) andalso (size(Addr) =:= 8))) -> 
  408:     verify_addr_info2(T, Domain);
  409: verify_addr_info2([#{family := DomainA}|T], DomainB) 
  410:   when (DomainA =/= DomainB) ->
  411:     %% Ignore entries for other domains
  412:     verify_addr_info2(T, DomainB);
  413: verify_addr_info2([BadAddrInfo|_], Domain) ->
  414:     ?FAIL({bad_address_info, BadAddrInfo, Domain}).
  415: 
  416: 
  417: 
  418: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  419: 
  420: %% Verify (interface) name and index functions.
  421: %% if_names/0,
  422: %% if_name2index/1
  423: %% if_index2name/1
  424: api_b_name_and_index(suite) ->
  425:     [];
  426: api_b_name_and_index(doc) ->
  427:     [];
  428: api_b_name_and_index(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  429:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  430:     tc_try(api_b_name_and_index,
  431:            fun() ->
  432:                    ok = api_b_name_and_index()
  433:            end).
  434: 
  435: 
  436: api_b_name_and_index() ->
  437:     try
  438:         begin
  439:             Names =
  440:                 case net:if_names() of
  441:                     {ok, N} when is_list(N) andalso (N =/= []) ->
  442:                         N;
  443:                     {error, enotsup = Reason} ->
  444:                         i("if_names not supported - skipping"),
  445:                         ?SKIP({if_names, Reason});
  446:                     {error, Reason} ->
  447:                         ?FAIL({if_names, Reason})
  448:                 end,
  449:             verify_if_names(Names)
  450:         end
  451:     catch
  452:         error : notsup = CReason ->
  453:             i("~w => skipping", [CReason]),
  454:             skip(CReason)
  455:     end.
  456:         
  457: 
  458: verify_if_names([]) ->
  459:     ok;
  460: verify_if_names([{Index, Name}|T]) ->
  461:     case net:if_name2index(Name) of
  462:         {ok, Index} ->
  463:             ok;
  464:         {ok, BadIndex} ->
  465:             ?FAIL({if_name2index, Name, Index, BadIndex});
  466:         {error, enotsup = Reason_N2I1} ->
  467:             i("if_name2index not supported - skipping"),
  468:             ?SKIP({if_name2index, Reason_N2I1});
  469:         {error, Reason_N2I2} ->
  470:             ?FAIL({if_name2index, Name, Reason_N2I2})
  471:     end,
  472:     case net:if_index2name(Index) of
  473:         {ok, Name} ->
  474:             ok;
  475:         {ok, BadName} ->
  476:             ?FAIL({if_index2name, Index, Name, BadName});
  477:         {error, enotsup = Reason_I2N1} ->
  478:             i("if_index2name not supported - skipping"),
  479:             ?SKIP({if_index2name, Reason_I2N1});
  480:         {error, Reason_I2N2} ->
  481:             ?FAIL({if_index2name, Index, Reason_I2N2})
  482:     end,
  483:     verify_if_names(T).
  484: 
  485: 
  486: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  487: 
  488: api_m_getaddrinfo_v4() ->
  489:     required(v4).
  490: 
  491: api_m_getaddrinfo_v4(suite) ->
  492:     [];
  493: api_m_getaddrinfo_v4(doc) ->
  494:     [];
  495: api_m_getaddrinfo_v4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  496:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  497:     Pre  = fun() ->
  498:                    {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases,_,_} =
  499:                        ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  500:                    #{name      => Name,
  501:                      full_name => FullName,
  502:                      ip_string => IPStr,
  503:                      ip        => IP,
  504:                      aliases   => Aliases,
  505:                      family    => inet}
  506:            end,
  507:     Case = fun(Info) ->
  508:                    ok = api_m_getaddrinfo(Info)
  509:            end,
  510:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  511:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  512:            Pre, Case, Post).
  513: 
  514: 
  515: 
  516: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  517: 
  518: api_m_getaddrinfo_v6() ->
  519:     required(v6).
  520: 
  521: api_m_getaddrinfo_v6(suite) ->
  522:     [];
  523: api_m_getaddrinfo_v6(doc) ->
  524:     [];
  525: api_m_getaddrinfo_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  526:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  527:     Pre  = fun() ->
  528:                    {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases} =
  529:                        ct:get_config(test_host_ipv6_only),
  530:                    #{name      => Name,
  531:                      full_name => FullName,
  532:                      ip_string => IPStr,
  533:                      ip        => IP,
  534:                      aliases   => Aliases,
  535:                      family    => inet6}
  536:            end,
  537:     Case = fun(Info) ->
  538:                    ok = api_m_getaddrinfo(Info)
  539:            end,
  540:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  541:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  542:            Pre, Case, Post).
  543: 
  544: 
  545: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  546: 
  547: api_m_getaddrinfo(#{name   := Name,
  548:                     family := Domain,
  549:                     ip     := IP}) ->
  550:     i("Check address info for ~p with"
  551:       "~n   Domain: ~p"
  552:       "~n   IP:     ~p", [Name, Domain, IP]),
  553:     try net:getaddrinfo(Name) of
  554:         {ok, AddrInfos} ->
  555:             %% Check that we can actually find this IP in the list
  556:             api_m_getaddrinfo_verify(AddrInfos, Name, Domain, IP);
  557:         {error, enotsup = ReasonAI} ->
  558:             i("getaddrinfo not supported - skipping"),
  559:             ?SKIP({getaddrinfo, ReasonAI});
  560:         {error, Reason} ->
  561:             ?FAIL({gethaddrinfo, Name, Reason})
  562:     catch
  563:         error : notsup = Reason ->
  564:             i("~w => skipping", [Reason]),
  565:             skip(Reason)
  566:     end.
  567: 
  568: 
  569: 
  570: %% First we filter out the address info of the correct domain (family), then:
  571: %% 1) If there is no address info left: SKIP
  572: %% 2) If there are address info, check for the selected address
  573: 
  574: api_m_getaddrinfo_verify(AddrInfos, Name, Domain, IP) ->
  575:     i("Attempt to verify from ~w address-infos", [length(AddrInfos)]),
  576:     AddrInfos2 = [AI || #{family := D} = AI <- AddrInfos, D =:= Domain],
  577:     case AddrInfos2 of
  578:         [] ->
  579:             i("No address info of correct domain (~w) available", [Domain]),
  580:             ?SKIP({no_ai_of_domain, Domain});
  581:         _ ->
  582:             api_m_getaddrinfo_verify2(AddrInfos, Name, Domain, IP)
  583:     end.
  584: 
  585: api_m_getaddrinfo_verify2([], Name, Domain, IP) ->
  586:     i("No match found for ~p: "
  587:       "~n   Domain:   ~p"
  588:       "~n   IP:       ~p", [Name, Domain, IP]),
  589:     ?FAIL({not_found, Name, Domain, IP});
  590: api_m_getaddrinfo_verify2([#{family := Domain,
  591:                             addr   := #{addr   := IP, 
  592:                                         family := Domain} = _SockAddr} = 
  593:                               AddrInfo|_],
  594:                          Name, Domain, IP) ->
  595:     i("Found match for ~p: "
  596:       "~n   AddrInfo: ~p"
  597:       "~n   Domain:   ~p"
  598:       "~n   IP:       ~p", [Name, AddrInfo, Domain, IP]),
  599:     ok;
  600: api_m_getaddrinfo_verify2([AddrInfo|AddrInfos], Name, Domain, IP) ->
  601:     i("No match: "
  602:       "~n   AddrInfo: ~p"
  603:       "~n   Domain: ~p"
  604:       "~n   IP:     ~p", [AddrInfo, Domain, IP]),
  605:     api_m_getaddrinfo_verify2(AddrInfos, Name, Domain, IP).
  606: 
  607: 
  608: 
  609: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  610: 
  611: api_m_getnameinfo_v4() ->
  612:     required(v4).
  613: 
  614: api_m_getnameinfo_v4(suite) ->
  615:     [];
  616: api_m_getnameinfo_v4(doc) ->
  617:     [];
  618: api_m_getnameinfo_v4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  619:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  620:     Pre  = fun() ->
  621:                    {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases,_,_} =
  622:                        ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  623:                    #{name      => Name,
  624:                      full_name => FullName,
  625:                      ip_string => IPStr,
  626:                      ip        => IP,
  627:                      aliases   => Aliases,
  628:                      family    => inet}
  629:            end,
  630:     Case = fun(Info) ->
  631:                    ok = api_m_getnameinfo(Info)
  632:            end,
  633:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  634:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  635:            Pre, Case, Post).
  636: 
  637: 
  638: 
  639: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  640: 
  641: api_m_getnameinfo_v6() ->
  642:     required(v6).
  643: 
  644: api_m_getnameinfo_v6(suite) ->
  645:     [];
  646: api_m_getnameinfo_v6(doc) ->
  647:     [];
  648: api_m_getnameinfo_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  649:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  650:     Pre  = fun() ->
  651:                    {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases} =
  652:                        ct:get_config(test_host_ipv6_only),
  653:                    #{name      => Name,
  654:                      full_name => FullName,
  655:                      ip_string => IPStr,
  656:                      ip        => IP,
  657:                      aliases   => Aliases,
  658:                      family    => inet6}
  659:            end,
  660:     Case = fun(Info) ->
  661:                    ok = api_m_getnameinfo(Info)
  662:            end,
  663:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  664:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  665:            Pre, Case, Post).
  666: 
  667: 
  668: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  669: 
  670: api_m_getnameinfo(#{name      := Name,
  671:                     full_name := FName,
  672:                     family    := Domain,
  673:                     ip        := IP}) ->
  674:     i("Check name info for ~p with"
  675:       "~n   Domain: ~p"
  676:       "~n   IP:     ~p", [Name, Domain, IP]),
  677:     SA = #{family => Domain,
  678:            addr   => IP},
  679:     try net:getnameinfo(SA) of
  680:         {ok, NameInfo} ->
  681:             %% Check that we can actually find this IP in the list
  682:             api_m_getnameinfo_verify(NameInfo, Name, FName, IP);
  683:         {error, enotsup = ReasonAI} ->
  684:             i("getaddrinfo not supported - skipping"),
  685:             ?SKIP({getnameinfo, ReasonAI});
  686:         {error, Reason} ->
  687:             ?FAIL({getnameinfo, Name, Reason})
  688:     catch
  689:         error : notsup = Reason ->
  690:             i("~w => skipping", [Reason]),
  691:             skip(Reason)
  692:     end.
  693: 
  694: 
  695: api_m_getnameinfo_verify(#{host := Name} = NameInfo, Name, _FName, _IP) ->
  696:     i("Found (name) match for ~p: "
  697:       "~n   NameInfo: ~p", [Name, NameInfo]),
  698:     ok;
  699: api_m_getnameinfo_verify(#{host := FName} = NameInfo, _Name, FName, _IP) ->
  700:     i("Found (full name) match for ~p: "
  701:       "~n   NameInfo: ~p", [FName, NameInfo]),
  702:     ok;
  703: api_m_getnameinfo_verify(#{host := IPStr} = NameInfo, Name, FName, IP)
  704:   when (size(IP) =:= 8) ->
  705:     %% On some hosts we get back the IPv6 address as a string.
  706:     %% Exampole: 
  707:     %%     {65216,0,0,0,2560,8447,65202,46249} -> "fec0::a00:20ff:feb2:b4a9"
  708:     %% This is possibly because of bad config of the host.
  709:     case inet_parse:ipv6_address(IPStr) of
  710:         {ok, IP} ->
  711:             i("Found (IP string) \"match\" for ~p: "
  712:               "~n   NameInfo: ~p", [IP, NameInfo]),
  713:             ok;
  714:         _ ->
  715:             ?FAIL({not_found, NameInfo, Name, FName})
  716:     end;
  717: api_m_getnameinfo_verify(NameInfo, Name, FName, _IP) ->
  718:     i("No match found for ~p (~p): "
  719:       "~n   NameInfo: ~p", [Name, FName, NameInfo]),
  720:     ?FAIL({not_found, NameInfo, Name, FName}).
  721: 
  722: 
  723: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  724: 
  725: %% This gets the local address (not 127.0...)
  726: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
  727: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
  728: which_local_addr(Domain) ->
  729:     case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
  730:         {ok, Addr} ->
  731:             Addr;
  732:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
  733:             skip(ERROR)
  734:     end.
  735: 
  736: 
  737: 
  738: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  739: 
  740: %% not_yet_implemented() ->
  741: %%     skip("not yet implemented").
  742: 
  743: skip(Reason) ->
  744:     throw({skip, Reason}).
  745: 
  746: 
  747: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  748: 
  749: formated_timestamp() ->
  750:     format_timestamp(os:timestamp()).
  751: 
  752: format_timestamp({_N1, _N2, _N3} = TS) ->
  753:     {_Date, Time}   = calendar:now_to_local_time(TS),
  754:     %% {YYYY,MM,DD}   = Date,
  755:     {Hour,Min,Sec} = Time,
  756:     %% FormatTS = 
  757:     %%     io_lib:format("~.4w-~.2.0w-~.2.0w ~.2.0w:~.2.0w:~.2.0w.~w",
  758:     %%                   [YYYY, MM, DD, Hour, Min, Sec, N3]),  
  759:     FormatTS = io_lib:format("~.2.0w:~.2.0w:~.2.0w", [Hour, Min, Sec]),  
  760:     lists:flatten(FormatTS).
  761: 
  762:    
  763: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  764: 
  765: tc_try(Case, TC) ->
  766:     ?TC_TRY(Case, TC).
  767: 
  768: tc_try(Case, Pre, TC, Post) ->
  769:     ?TC_TRY(Case, Pre, TC, Post).
  770: 
  771: 
  772: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  773: 
  774: %% Required configuration
  775: required(v4) ->
  776:     [{require, test_host_ipv4_only}];
  777: required(v6) ->
  778:     [{require, test_host_ipv6_only}].
  779: 
  780: 
  781: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  782: 
  783: %% l2a(S) when is_list(S) ->
  784: %%     list_to_atom(S).
  785: 
  786: %% l2b(L) when is_list(L) ->
  787: %%     list_to_binary(L).
  788: 
  789: %% b2l(B) when is_binary(B) ->
  790: %%     binary_to_list(B).
  791: 
  792: f(F, A) ->
  793:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format(F, A)).
  794: 
  795: 
  796: i(F) ->
  797:     i(F, []).
  798: 
  799: i(F, A) ->
  800:     FStr = f("[~s] " ++ F, [formated_timestamp()|A]),
  801:     io:format(user, FStr ++ "~n", []),
  802:     io:format(FStr, []).
  803:
